Device.Name: W25X16_W25X16A_W25X32_W25X64
Device.Description: W25Xxx Serial Memories provide a storage solution for systems with limited space,pins,power.The W25X series offers flexibility and performance well beyond ordinary Serial devices.They are ideal for code download applicatins as well as storing voice,test and data.
Device.KeyWord: W25X16, W25X32, W25X64, Flash, SPI, CoX
